command.name: plan
command.description: Batch plan issue resolution using issue-plan-agent (explore + plan closed-loop)

intent.primary_user_value: Batch plan one or more issues by running issue-plan-agent (explore + plan) and binding a solution when unambiguous.

must_not: Do not claim a pointer is Existing unless it is verifiable in the repo now
Do not read issues.jsonl or solutions/*.jsonl directly; use ccw issue CLI commands
No destructive operations unless explicitly requested
